conversations.body_text: Hi Frederick Y,  ​We can modify the order directly for you, and we will refund the overpayment or ask you to make up the difference. What would you like to buy?

Hi,

Thanks for your reply! I would prefer the refund and then buying by myself later? Could we do that?

Thanks!
